title: Terms of Service
subtitle: Please read the following terms and conditions carefully
importantNoticeText: By accessing or using our services, you agree to comply with all terms and conditions of this agreement.
finalReminderText: Before you click the purchase button and complete payment, please carefully read this refund policy. After payment is completed, it means you fully understand and accept our no-refund policy and cannot request a refund for any reason.
specialCircumstancesText: Including but not limited to account suspension, service interruption, etc., none of these constitute grounds for refund.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to our website proxy access service. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content: We provide website proxy access services to help users access restricted websites and improve network performance. Our services include:

refundPolicy.title: 3. Refund Policy
refundPolicy.noRefund: All purchased services do not support refunds.
refundPolicy.noRefundText: Once payment is completed, we do not provide refund services for any reason.
refundPolicy.immediateEffectText: After successful payment, the service takes effect immediately and cannot be revoked or refunded.
refundPolicy.purchaseConfirmationText: Payment indicates that you have confirmed the purchase and agree to the no-refund policy.
refundPolicy.serviceNatureText: Due to the instant and irreversible nature of our website proxy access service, once the service starts, it cannot be revoked.
refundPolicy.technicalLimitationsText: Service resources are allocated immediately after purchase and cannot be recovered or transferred.
refundPolicy.usageStatusText: Regardless of whether you actually use the service, no refunds are provided.
refundPolicy.serviceQualityText: If you encounter service quality issues, we will provide technical support, but no refunds.
refundPolicy.refundExceptionsText: In any case, we do not provide refund services. Please consider carefully before purchasing.

userResponsibilities.title: 4. User Responsibilities
responsibilities: Complying with local laws and regulations
Not using the service for illegal activities

serviceLimitations.title: 5. Service Limitations
limitations: Suspend or terminate services for violations
Modify service terms at any time

userAccount.title: 4. User Account
userAccount.registrationRequirementsText: You must provide true, accurate, and complete information to create an account.
userAccount.accountSecurityText: You are responsible for protecting your account information, including username and password.
userAccount.accountUsageText: You may not transfer your account to others or allow others to use your account.

userBehavior.title: 5. User Behavior Standards
prohibitedActions: Publishing illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, or obscene content
Infringing on others' intellectual property or other rights
Spreading viruses, malicious code, or other harmful technologies
Interfering with or disrupting the normal operation of services
Conducting any form of commercial activity without our explicit permission

intellectualProperty.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.ourRightsText: All content in the service, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, and software, is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.userContentText: You retain rights to your uploaded content, but grant us a license to use, copy, modify, distribute, and publicly display that content.

privacyProtection.title: 7. Privacy Protection
privacyProtection.content: We value your privacy. How we collect, use, and protect your personal information is detailed in our privacy policy. By using our services, you agree to our processing of your information according to the privacy policy.

serviceChanges.title: 8. Service Changes and Termination
serviceChanges.serviceModificationsText: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate services at any time without notice.
serviceChanges.accountTerminationText: We may terminate your account for violations of this agreement without notice.

disclaimer.title: 9. Disclaimer
disclaimer.asIsText: We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free.
disclaimer.liabilityLimitationText: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use of the service.

indemnification.title: 10. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify us for any losses, damages, costs, and expenses arising from your violation of this agreement or any applicable law.

agreementModification.title: 11. Agreement Modification
agreementModification.content: We reserve the right to modify this agreement at any time. Significant changes will be notified via email or website announcement. Continued use of the service indicates your acceptance of the modified agreement.

governingLaw.title: 12. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: This agreement is governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China. Any disputes should be resolved through friendly negotiation. If negotiation fails, disputes should be brought to the competent people's court.
